details.description: Limit 1 per person. Must provide name and shipping address at checkout, which will be provided along with your Groupon login email to The Slanket to facilitate shipping. Valid only for option purchased. Online only. Any return must occur within 14 days of receiving goods. Ships within the contiguous U.S. only. Extra $5 fee for shipping. Does not ship to PO boxes. Ships out in 7-10 business days from purchase date. Goods sold by Groupon Goods.
